title: Perhaps a Repeat...but...
body: My first Discussion!!!  I'd post this in "support" but it won't let me log into that page.  I've been trying to log into the new client for several weeks now, and every time I try, I get this message "_The Client has failed to communicate with the Login Queue.  Please check your network connection and try again_."  I get this message whether I enter the correct password or not.  My legacy client logs in just fine, although the chat doesn't work pre-game once I get in.  Has anyone else been getting this message in their new Client?  I've let it through my firewall, and tried it with compatibility set for Windows 8 and Windows XP (I normally run Windows 10).    Has anyone else seen/dealt with this?

replies.body: None of the suggestions have been helpful.  I was not able to do Port Forwarding.
I've tried most of the items on this connection guide, and nothing's worked so far.  Still have to try a few of them though.

Are you still experiencing this issue? If so, there could be some issues with your local connection that is preventing you from properly reaching our login servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would serve as a great resource for steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
